name: General Info
description: This is the 3rd pack in the 1.18.2 series of forge packs. This pack will be the base for all of the TECH mods. This pack picks up where Almost Vanilla Plus left off. We have added Redstone, Networking, and Computers. We added mods that we want in all of our tech mods. Be sure to check out the whole manual for links to the wiki, issues and discussions links
